name: Cantech Letter
description: A website about Canadian tech stocks
overview: Founded in 2008 by Nick Waddell, Cantech Letter is an online magazine focusing on Canadian listed technology stocks. The site has grown into one of the most popular and respected financial sites in Canada, and was described by Canadian Business Magazine as “one of Canada’s premier technology newsletters”. Waddell, who is Senior Editor, is routinely called on by the mainstream media for perspective on Canadian tech stocks, and has been featured on BNN as well as the CBC program “The Lang and O’Leary Exchange”.
